task.name: i.smap
task.description: Performs contextual image classification using sequential maximum a posteriori (SMAP) estimation.
task.keywords: imagery, classification, supervised classification, segmentation, SMAP

parameter.name: signaturefile
parameter.label: Name of input file containing signatures

parameter.name: output
parameter.description: Name for output raster map holding classification results

parameter.name: goodness
parameter.description: Name for output raster map holding goodness of fit (lower is better)

parameter.name: blocksize
parameter.description: Size of submatrix to process at one time

flag.name: m
flag.description: Use maximum likelihood estimation (instead of smap)

flag.name: overwrite
flag.description: Allow output files to overwrite existing files
